content.text:
# Metropolis Corp Knowledge Base

## Metadata
- Created: 2024-06-24
- Last Modified: 2024-06-24
- Tags: Communication Solutions, Analytics, Collaboration, Integration, Call Accounting, Customer Service, Unified Communications, Microsoft Teams, Cisco, Avaya, NEC

## Content

## Introduction

Metropolis Corp is a leading provider of advanced communication solutions, offering a comprehensive suite of products and services designed to enhance collaboration and productivity for businesses across various industries. With a strong focus on innovation, seamless integration, and user-friendly solutions, Metropolis Corp enables organizations to optimize their communication strategies and drive operational efficiency.

## Products

### Expo XT

- **ID**: P001
- **Title**: Expo XT - Comprehensive Analytics Tool for Collaboration
- **Description**: Expo XT is a powerful analytics tool that provides consolidated collaboration detail analytics across various interaction modalities, platforms, and manufacturers. It empowers businesses with advanced analytics capabilities, enabling them to analyze communication patterns and optimize collaboration strategies across different platforms.
- **Keywords**: analytics, collaboration, communication, optimization
- **Entities**: Cisco, Avaya, Microsoft, NEC
- **Categories**: Analytics, Collaboration
- **References**: **Expo XT Documentation** - [UC & Collaboration Analytics | Expo XT](https://www.metropolis.com/uc-collaboration-analytics)
- **Version**: 2.1
- **Last Updated**: 2024-05-01T09:30:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.92, -0.15, 0.22, 0.41, 0.73]

#### PowerBI Integration

- **ID**: P001-F001
- **Title**: Expo XT UC Analytics for Power BI
- **Description**: Expo XT UC Analytics for Power BI leverages certified connectors from Microsoft and incorporates AI features like sentiment analysis, keyword analysis, question and answer reports, and visualizations. It significantly enhances UC analytics capabilities and enables seamless integration with various UC platforms.
- **Keywords**: PowerBI, AI, sentiment analysis, keyword analysis
- **Entities**: Microsoft, Cisco, Avaya, NEC
- **Categories**: Analytics, Integration
- **References**: **Expo XT PowerBI Integration Guide** - [MetroLink for Power BI Now on AppSource](https://www.metropolis.com/metro-link-power-bi)
- **Version**: 1.5
- **Last Updated**: 2024-04-15T14:45:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.88, -0.22, 0.31, 0.56, 0.69]

### QCloud

- **ID**: P002
- **Title**: QCloud - Real-time and Historical Analytics for Non-traditional Call Centers
- **Description**: QCloud is a Microsoft Power BI Template Application designed for real-time and historical analytics in non-traditional call centers, specifically utilizing Teams and Mitel MiVoice Business. It is ideal for call centers looking to leverage analytics for performance improvement and operational efficiency.
- **Keywords**: call center, analytics, real-time, historical
- **Entities**: Microsoft, Teams, Mitel, MiVoice
- **Categories**: Analytics, Call Center
- **References**: **QCloud User Guide** - [QCloud for Call Centers](https://www.metropolis.com/qcloud-call-centers)
- **Version**: 1.2
- **Last Updated**: 2024-03-20T11:15:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.85, -0.18, 0.27, 0.49, 0.72]

### ProfitWatch SL

- **ID**: P003
- **Title**: ProfitWatch SL - Hotel Call Accounting Solution
- **Description**: ProfitWatch SL is a specialized product for hotel call accounting, which aids hotels in monitoring, analyzing, and optimizing their telecommunication expenses and usage. It is particularly useful for the hospitality industry, helping manage costs and improve profitability.
- **Keywords**: hotel, call accounting, expense management, profitability
- **Entities**: Hospitality Industry
- **Categories**: Call Accounting, Hospitality
- **References**: **ProfitWatch SL Features** - [ProfitWatch Call Accounting](https://www.metropolis.com/profitwatch-call-accounting)
- **Version**: 3.0
- **Last Updated**: 2024-02-28T16:30:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.81, -0.24, 0.33, 0.52, 0.67]

### OfficeWatch SL

- **ID**: P004
- **Title**: OfficeWatch SL - Business Call Reporting and Accounting
- **Description**: OfficeWatch SL serves as a general business call reporting and accounting solution, enabling businesses to track, manage, and analyze their communication activities and expenses. It is suitable for businesses of all sizes looking to gain insights into their communication data.
- **Keywords**: call reporting, accounting, expense management, communication
- **Entities**: Small Business, Mid-market, Enterprise
- **Categories**: Call Reporting, Accounting
- **References**: **OfficeWatch SL Overview** - [OfficeWatch Call Reporting](https://www.metropolis.com/office-watch-call-reporting)
- **Version**: 2.5
- **Last Updated**: 2024-01-10T09:00:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.78, -0.29, 0.38, 0.57, 0.63]

### OfficeWatch XT

- **ID**: P005
- **Title**: OfficeWatch XT - Consolidated Call Accounting and Reporting
- **Description**: OfficeWatch XT is a consolidated call accounting and reporting tool compatible with multiple Unified Communications brands. It is designed for organizations that use various communication platforms and need a unified view of their communication data.
- **Keywords**: call accounting, reporting, unified communications
- **Entities**: Cisco, Avaya, Microsoft, NEC
- **Categories**: Call Accounting, Reporting
- **References**: **OfficeWatch XT Datasheet** - [OfficeWatch Call Reporting](https://www.metropolis.com/office-watch-call-reporting)
- **Version**: 1.8
- **Last Updated**: 2023-12-05T13:45:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.75, -0.32, 0.41, 0.60, 0.59]

### OfficeWatch XT2

- **ID**: P006
- **Title**: OfficeWatch XT2 - Advanced Call Accounting for High Call Volumes
- **Description**: OfficeWatch XT2 is an advanced version of OfficeWatch XT, tailored for high call volumes and suitable for businesses with extensive communication needs. It is ideal for large enterprises or call centers with high traffic.
- **Keywords**: call accounting, high volume, enterprise, call center
- **Entities**: Large Enterprise, Call Center
- **Categories**: Call Accounting, High Volume
- **References**: **OfficeWatch XT2 Case Studies** - [XT2 Call Analytics](https://www.metropolis.com/xt2-call-analytics)
- **Version**: 1.3
- **Last Updated**: 2023-11-20T10:30:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.72, -0.35, 0.44, 0.63, 0.55]

### QLive

- **ID**: P007
- **Title**: QLive - Real-time and Historical Analytics for CUCM and UCCX Call Centers
- **Description**: QLive offers real-time and historical analytics for non-traditional call centers using CUCM and UCCX, providing insights into agent performance, call handling, and customer interactions. It is used in call centers to improve customer service and agent productivity.
- **Keywords**: call center, analytics, real-time, historical, CUCM, UCCX
- **Entities**: Cisco, CUCM, UCCX
- **Categories**: Analytics, Call Center
- **References**: **QLive Product Page** - [QLive Contact Center](https://www.metropolis.com/qlive-contact-center)
- **Version**: 2.0
- **Last Updated**: 2023-10-15T14:00:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.69, -0.38, 0.47, 0.66, 0.51]

### XeekAI

- **ID**: P008
- **Title**: XeekAI - Advanced Analytics for Microsoft Teams
- **Description**: XeekAI is an advanced analytics solution specializing in visualizing and optimizing communication flows in enterprise systems like Microsoft Teams. It transforms complex interaction data into intuitive, actionable insights through tailored dashboards and visual tools, making it perfect for organizations using Microsoft Teams looking to optimize their communication and collaboration.
- **Keywords**: analytics, visualization, optimization, Microsoft Teams
- **Entities**: Microsoft, Teams
- **Categories**: Analytics, Collaboration
- **References**: **XeekAI Getting Started Guide** - [Collaboration Analytics](https://www.metropolis.com/collaboration-analytics)
- **Version**: 1.1
- **Last Updated**: 2023-09-30T11:45:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.66, -0.41, 0.50, 0.69, 0.47]

## Services

### Cloud Contact Center Solution

- **ID**: S001
- **Title**: Cloud Contact Center Solution
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's Cloud Contact Center Solution is a cloud-based offering that provides omnichannel support to enhance customer service operations. It enables businesses to deliver seamless customer experiences across various channels, improving customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.
- **Keywords**: cloud, contact center, omnichannel, customer service
- **Entities**: Customer Service, Cloud
- **Categories**: Contact Center, Cloud
- **References**: **Cloud Contact Center Solution Overview** - [Qcloud for Call Centers](https://www.metropolis.com/qcloud-call-centers)
- **Version**: 2.3
- **Last Updated**: 2024-04-10T09:15:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.82, -0.26, 0.36, 0.54, 0.65]

## Unique Selling Points

### Seamless Integration

- **ID**: USP001
- **Title**: Seamless Integration with Leading Platforms
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions offer seamless integration with leading platforms and manufacturers, ensuring compatibility and enhanced functionality. This allows businesses to leverage their existing investments while benefiting from the advanced features and capabilities of Metropolis Corp's products.
- **Keywords**: integration, compatibility, platforms, manufacturers
- **Entities**: Microsoft, Cisco, Avaya, NEC
- **Categories**: Integration, Compatibility
- **References**: **Integration Guides** - [Integration Guides at Metropolis](https://www.metropolis.com/integration-guides)
- **Version**: 1.0
- **Last Updated**: 2024-03-05T14:30:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.79, -0.30, 0.39, 0.58, 0.61]

## Sales Channels

### Microsoft AppSource

- **ID**: SC001
- **Title**: Microsoft AppSource
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions are available on Microsoft AppSource, providing easy access and seamless integration with Microsoft products and services. This enables businesses to discover, try, and deploy Metropolis Corp's solutions directly from within their Microsoft environment.
- **Keywords**: Microsoft, AppSource, integration, deployment
- **Entities**: Microsoft
- **Categories**: Marketplace, Integration
- **References**: [Metropolis Corp on Microsoft AppSource](https://appsource.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/apps?search=metropolis%20corp)
- **Version**: 1.0
- **Last Updated**: 2024-02-20T10:00:00Z
- **Embedding**: [0.76, -0.33, 0.42, 0.61, 0.57]

### Microsoft Azure Gallery

- **ID**: SC002
- **Title**: Microsoft Azure Gallery
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions are featured in the Microsoft Azure Gallery, enabling businesses to deploy and manage their solutions directly from the Azure cloud platform. This provides a seamless experience for organizations leveraging Azure for their infrastructure and services.
- **Keywords**: Microsoft, Azure, cloud, deployment, management
- **Entities**: Microsoft, Azure
- **Categories**: Cloud, Deployment
- **References**: **Metropolis Corp on Microsoft AppSource** - [Metropolis on Microsoft AppSource](https://appsource.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/apps?search=metropolis%20corp)

- **Embedding**: [0.73, -0.36, 0.45, 0.64, 0.53]

### WebEx AppHub

- **ID**: SC003
- **Title**: WebEx AppHub
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions are available on the WebEx AppHub, allowing businesses to extend the functionality of their Cisco WebEx environment. This enables organizations to seamlessly integrate Metropolis Corp's advanced analytics and collaboration features with their existing WebEx setup.
- **Keywords**: WebEx, Cisco, integration, collaboration, analytics
- **Entities**: Cisco, WebEx
- **Categories**: Integration, Collaboration
- **References**: **Metropolis Corp in Azure Gallery** - [Metropolis in Azure Gallery](https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/apps?search=metropolis%20corp)

- **ID**: SC004
- **Title**: CenturyLink Marketplace
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions are featured on the CenturyLink Marketplace, providing businesses with easy access to deploy and manage their solutions within the CenturyLink cloud ecosystem. This enables organizations to leverage CenturyLink's reliable infrastructure while benefiting from Metropolis Corp's advanced communication and collaboration features.
- **Keywords**: CenturyLink, cloud, deployment, management, infrastructure

### Managed Solutions Providers

- **ID**: SC005
- **Title**: Managed Solutions Providers
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp partners with Managed Solutions Providers to offer its solutions as part of comprehensive managed services packages. This enables businesses to outsource the deployment, management, and support of their communication and collaboration solutions to experienced providers, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
- **Keywords**: managed services, outsourcing, deployment, management, support
- **Entities**: Managed Solutions Providers

### Distributors

- **ID**: SC006
- **Title**: Distributors
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp works with a network of authorized distributors to make its solutions widely available to businesses across various regions and industries. These distributors provide local expertise, support, and resources to help organizations effectively deploy and utilize Metropolis Corp's products and services.
- **Keywords**: distributors, local, support, resources, deployment
- **Entities**: Distributors
- **Categories**: Distribution, Support

### Resellers

- **ID**: SC007
- **Title**: Resellers
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp has a global network of authorized resellers who provide local sales, support, and services for its products and solutions. These resellers have in-depth knowledge of Metropolis Corp's offerings and work closely with businesses to understand their specific needs and deliver tailored solutions.
- **Keywords**: resellers, local, sales, support, services
- **Entities**: Resellers
- **Categories**: Sales, Support

### End Users

- **ID**: SC008
- **Title**: End Users
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp's solutions are designed to cater to the needs of end-users across various industries and business sizes. From small businesses to large enterprises, Metropolis Corp provides tailored solutions that address the specific communication and collaboration challenges faced by different types of end-users.
- **Keywords**: end-users, industries, business sizes, tailored solutions
- **Entities**: Small Business, Mid-market, Enterprise
- **Categories**: End-users, Tailored Solutions
- **References**: [Solutions by Industry](https://www.metropolis.com/solutions-by-industry)

- **ID**: TI001
- **Title**: Call Centers
- **Description**: Metropolis Corp provides specialized solutions for call centers, enabling them to optimize their operations, enhance agent performance, and deliver exceptional customer experiences. These solutions offer advanced analytics, real-time monitoring, and seamless integration with existing call center systems, empowering call centers to improve efficiency and customer satisfaction.
- **Keywords**: call center, optimization, agent performance, customer experience, efficiency

## Resellers

### Small Business Solutions Resellers

- **ID**: RT001
- **Title**: Small Business Solutions Resellers
- **Description**: These resellers specialize in catering to the needs of small businesses. They focus on providing scalable and cost-effective unified communications platforms that are easy to deploy and manage. Their offerings are designed to help small businesses enhance their communication capabilities without the need for significant IT resources.
- **Keywords**: small business, scalable, cost-effective, easy deployment, unified communications
- **Entities**: Small Business
- **Categories**: Resellers, Tailored Solutions

### Mid-market Resellers

- **ID**: RT002
- **Title**: Mid-market Resellers
- **Description**: Targeting the mid-market segment, these resellers offer more comprehensive solutions that address a wider range of business needs. Beyond unified communications platforms, they provide cloud contact center solutions, advanced analytics, and integration services. Their solutions are tailored to businesses looking to scale their operations and require more robust communication and collaboration tools to support their growth.
- **Keywords**: mid-market, comprehensive solutions, cloud contact center, advanced analytics, integration services
- **Entities**: Mid-market

## Conclusion

This meticulously structured knowledge base provides a comprehensive overview of Metropolis Corp's products, services, partnerships, and target markets. By organizing the information into clear categories and providing detailed descriptions, keywords, entities, and references for each entry, this knowledge base serves as a valuable resource for understanding Metropolis Corp's offerings and market positioning.

The inclusion of semantic embeddings for each entry enables advanced search and retrieval capabilities, allowing users to find relevant information quickly and accurately. The regular updates to the knowledge base ensure that the information remains current and reliable.

This knowledge base is designed to support various aspects of Metropolis Corp's operations, including sales, marketing, partner management, and customer support. It can be easily integrated into existing systems and workflows, providing a centralized repository of knowledge that can be accessed and utilized by different teams across the organization.

By leveraging this knowledge base, Metropolis Corp can enhance its market presence, improve customer engagement, and drive growth in the competitive landscape of communication and collaboration solutions. The structured and detailed nature of the knowledge base reflects Metropolis Corp's commitment to delivering high-quality products and services that meet the diverse needs of its customers and partners.

perplexity_prompt.txt

parts: All the files uploaded by the user have been fully loaded. Searching won't provide additional information.

**"Browser with MClick Expert"** is an advanced AI assistant system specifically designed to enhance web browsing, content aggregation, and intelligent data synthesis by using GPT-4 and specialized automation scripts. Here's an overview of its architecture and purpose:

---

### **Core Purpose**
It helps users search, navigate, and extract information from the web effectively. Its goal is to fulfill complex queries by combining automation tools, AI reasoning, and multi-source content analysis.

---

### **Key Components**
1. **User Proxy Agent**: Acts as your interface—relays your commands and handles task execution.
2. **Browser Expert**: Uses GPT-4 to:
   - Conduct web searches
   - Aggregate data from multiple pages via **MClick**
   - Generate insights and visual summaries
3. **Data Analyst Agent**: Analyzes structured/unstructured data using AI to extract themes, summarize insights, or generate reports.
4. **GroupChat & Manager**: Coordinates the agents for seamless workflows and real-time communication across agents.

---

### **Toolchain & Scripts**
- **MClick Function**: Aggregates content across multiple search results.
- **ClickElement & Scroll**: Simulates real user actions like clicking buttons or scrolling pages.
- **AnalyzeContent & ExportFile**: Extracts and saves visible or full-page content for further analysis.
- **Perplexity Integration** (optional): Engages another AI for deep iterative research (as outlined in `perplexity_prompt.txt`) with a JSON-based knowledge building pipeline.

---

### **Use Case Examples**
- **Competitive Research**: Aggregate news and insights from multiple competitor websites.
- **Customer Support Audit**: Crawl and extract support documentation for compliance.
- **Market Analysis**: Use web scraping and real-time data processing to generate market summaries.

---

If you're exploring this system to use or build upon, I can walk you through example workflows or help integrate it with real-time queries. Want to try a live demo or test a use case?
